text.__SUMMARY__: Ceratozamia fuscoviridis is a species of plant in the family Zamiaceae. It is endemic to Hidalgo state in Mexico. It is a Critically endangered species, threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Osborne R, Stevenson DWM, Vovides AP What is Ceratozamia fuscoviridis ? Delpinoa 2006; 48: 5-10
